content.rendered:
Paratex provides general pest prevention services for commercial and residential customers looking to control and prevent rodents and pest insects. Additionally, we have our own fumigation vault in SODO and perform on-site fumigation of structures, containers and commodities; we provide exclusion services for bird control and pest entry of structures (barriers) and specialize in keeping food manufacturing and distribution facilities compliant with government regulations. We also provide licensed rodent abatement certification for any size demolition construction project.

Paratex customers rely on our expert prevention for a wide range of needs: hospitals to restaurants, apartment buildings to single-family homes, wool rugs to large yachts and everything in between.

Rodents and Mammals

Rodents sometimes carry harmful diseases which can spread to people through bites, contaminated food and water, germs from rodent urine or droppings that are in the air.

  • Learn More

Insects & Spiders

There are many varieties of insect in the Pacific Northwest. We can help with the ones listed below and many more.

  • Ants
  • Wasps & Bees
  • Bed Bugs
  • Roaches
  • Spiders
  • More >

Fumigation

Fumigation is the use of a gas instead of a liquid or dust pesticide. We’re one of the few companies in the Northwest with the licenses, insurance and experience to perform fumigations.

  • Learn More

Exclusion

Paratex has many years of experience in bird control. Every job is different, and our ability to both design and install has allowed us to understand the balance of aesthetics and effectiveness.

  • Learn More

Wood Destroying Organisms

A number of wood destroying pests make their home in the Pacific Northwest. Whether they be ants, beetles, termites or another wood destroying organism, we can help you.

  • Learn More
